mapper.select: select date,productNo, category,division,section,subject,color,price from productviews as pv left join product as p on p.`no` = pv.productNo;

select pv.`productNo` as no,count(*) as count,p.category,p.division,p.section,p.subject,p.color,p.size,p.price from `productviews` as pv left join product as p on pv.productNo = p.`no` group by pv.productNo order by count desc limit #{startPage}, #{endPage};
